mapper.select: select fq.* from fill_question fq,paper_manage pm where pm.questionType = 2 and pm.paperId = #{paperId} and fq.questionId=pm.questionId
mapper.insert: insert into fill_question (subject, question, answer, analysis, score, level, section) value (#{subject},#{question},#{answer},#{analysis},#{score},#{level},#{section})
mapper.select: select questionId from fill_question where subject = #{subject}
